keyword: how many calories in a russet potato
title: How Many Calories in a Russet Potato?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a russet potato, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for baked or boiled prep.
h1: How Many Calories in a Russet Potato?
assumptions: Medium russet potato (~173 g), baked with skin, no added butter, oil, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by potato size, variety, cooking method, and additions like salt or oil. Check sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One medium russet potato provides about 168 kcal and 4.7 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a medium russet potato?
faqs.a: About 168 kcal for one medium russet potato baked with skin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a russet potato?
faqs.a: One medium russet potato has ~37.8 g carbs, including 3.4 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does baking a russet potato add calories?
faqs.a: Baking plain adds none, but toppings like butter or sour cream increase calories significantly.

faqs.q: How much protein in a russet potato?
faqs.a: Approximately 4.7 g protein per medium russet potato.

faqs.q: Are russet potatoes low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.2 g total fat per medium potato, with 0 g saturated fat.
